Key Match Events: Curry recorded a season-high 36 points on 13-of-23 shooting from the field with seven made 3-pointers in 37 minutes.
Curry added seven assists, five rebounds and a steal in Golden State's impressive 127-116 win over the Thunder.
In the third quarter, Curry scored 17 of his 36 points on 7-of-10 shooting.
Later in the fourth quarter, Curry buried a pair of clutch 3-pointers to ice the game for the Warriors when the Thunder threatened a late comeback.
Curry drilled two 3-pointers to slam the door in Oklahoma City after the Thunder cut the Warriors' lead to six points with four minutes remaining.
